title: Suspect arrested over attempt to set fire to Rambukkana fuel bowser granted bail
body_lines: The youth, who was arrested for attempting to set fire to the fuel bowser during the tense situation in the area of Rambukkana earlier this week, has been granted bail.
The suspect was released on two surety bails each valued at Rs. 100,000 before the Kegalle Magistrate’s Court.
The 27-year-old was taken into custody by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) last night (April 22).
